item.title: Quick terminal-based DNS switching
item.description: This post was originally published on thecodecousins by StanleyNguyen. I add the Linux section for more details. Motivation Most of us, at some point of our lives, have used at least a custom DNS servers configurations for our computers. Be it for avoiding censorship, faster browsing, security, or bypassing content restriction, we’ve all tried setting our DNS servers to some public DNS servers like one from Google (remember 8.8.8.8 and 8.
